name: Pinnacle Studio Project Template
summary: A PSTEMPLATE file is a movie project template created by Corel Pinnacle Studio, a video-editing application. It contains video project information, including settings and placeholders for media imported into the timeline. Pinnacle Studio users save projects as PSTEMPLATE files, which are similar to .AXP files, to replicate projects with similar content.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
